name: TRANSLATION_DETAILS
documentation: Class providing details of a natural language translation.

language.name: language
language.documentation: Language of the translation, coded using ISO 639-1 (2 character) language codes.

author.name: author
author.documentation: Primary translator name and other demographic details.

accreditation.name: accreditation
accreditation.documentation: Accreditation of primary translator or group, usually a national translator's registration or association membership id.

version_last_translated.name: version_last_translated
version_last_translated.documentation: Version of this resource last time it was translated into the language represented by this `TRANSLATION_DETAILS` object.

other_contributors.name: other_contributors
other_contributors.documentation: Additional contributors to this translation, each listed in the preferred format of the relevant organisation for the artefacts in question. A typical default is `"name <email>"` if nothing else is specified.
